snippet: Douglas F. Whitman, the founder of Whitman Capital, surrendered to the F.B.I. on charges of illegal trading in tech stocks using tips from people in the Galleon Group fraud.
abstract: Douglas F. Whitman, the founder of Whitman Capital, surrendered to the F.B.I. on charges of illegal trading in tech stocks using tips from people in the Galleon Group fraud.

byline.original: By BEN PROTESS and PETER LATTMAN

headline.main: Fund's Chief Is Charged in Case Tied to Galleon
